languages.text: "Сама память об этом притоне греха оскорбляет мою веру. Молениями и бдениями священными я стер название родного мира из своей памяти — ибо иначе посеял бы семена раскаяниями и ереси в самой душе".

"The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."
languages.original_text: "Сама память об этом притоне греха оскорбляет мою веру. Молениями и бдениями священными я стер название родного мира из своей памяти — ибо иначе посеял бы семена раскаяниями и ереси в самой душе".

traits.locale_text: "The very memory of that den of sin insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my home world from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

"The very memory of that den of sin insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my home world from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

"The very memory of that den of sin insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

"The very memory of that den of sin insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

"The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

languages.text: “光是想起那个罪恶的巢穴，我就感觉到我的信仰受到了侮辱。我通过祈祷与庄严的守夜，将那个世界的名字从我的记忆中彻底抹除，否则它会在我的灵魂中种下异端的种子。”
languages.original_text: "The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

traits.locale_text: “光是想起那个罪恶的巢穴，我就感觉到我的信仰受到了侮辱。我通过祈祷与庄严的守夜，将那个世界的名字从我的记忆中彻底抹去了，否则它会在我的灵魂中种下异端的种子。”

languages.text: «El mero hecho de recordar semejante morada de vileza supone un insulto a mi fe. Fue mediante oraciones y vigilias solemnes como logré borrar de mi memoria el nombre de mi mundo natal, pues de lo contrario habría plantado las semillas del arrepentimiento y la herejía en mi propia alma».
languages.original_text: "The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

traits.locale_text: «El mero hecho de recordar semejante morada del pecado supone un insulto a mi fe. Fue mediante oraciones y vigilias solemnes como logré borrar de mi memoria el nombre de mi mundo natal, pues de lo contrario habría plantado las semillas del arrepentimiento y la herejía en mi propia alma».

languages.text: 「あの悪の巣窟のことを思い出すだけでも我が信仰に対する冒涜となります。祈りと厳粛な警戒を通して、私は故郷の名を記憶から消し去りました――さもなければ、私は自らの魂に後悔と異端の種を蒔くことになります」
languages.original_text: "The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

traits.locale_text: 「あの悪の巣窟のことを思い出すだけでも我が信仰に対する冒涜となります。祈りと厳粛な警戒を通して、私は故郷の名を記憶から消し去りました――さもなければ、私は自らの魂に後悔と異端の種を蒔くことになります」

languages.text: "Allein die Erinnerung an diesen Sündenpfuhl beleidigt meinen Glauben. Ich habe den Namen meiner Heimatwelt durch Gebete und Mahnwachen aus meinem Gedächtnis getilgt – denn anderenfalls hätte ich Bedauern und Ketzerei in meiner eigenen Seele gesät."
languages.original_text: "The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

traits.locale_text: "Schon die Erinnerung an diesen Sündenpfuhl beleidigt meinen Glauben. Ich habe den Namen meiner Heimatwelt durch Gebete und Mahnwachen aus meinem Gedächtnis getilgt – denn anderenfalls hätte ich Bedauern und Ketzerei in meiner eigenen Seele gesät."

languages.text: « Le simple souvenir de cet antre du mal est une insulte à ma foi. Par la force de mes prières et de mes veilles solennelles, je suis parvenu à effacer le nom de ma planète de ma mémoire... J'ai ainsi évité de laisser s'implanter les graines du regret et de l'hérésie dans mon âme. »
languages.original_text: "The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

traits.locale_text: « Le simple souvenir de cet antre du péché est une insulte à ma foi. Par la force de mes prières et de mes veilles solennelles, je suis parvenu à effacer le nom de ma planète de ma mémoire... J'ai ainsi évité de laisser s'implanter les graines du regret et de l'hérésie dans mon âme. »

languages.text: "O şer yuvasının anısı bile inancıma hakarettir. Dualarla ve ibadetlerle yurdumun adını hafızamdan sildim. Aksi takdirde ruhuma pişmanlık ve kâfirlik tohumları ekebilirdim."
languages.original_text: "The very memory of that den of vileness insults my faith. Through prayers and solemn vigils, I wiped the name of my homeworld from memory — else I would have planted the seeds of regret and heresy in my own soul."

traits.locale_text: "O kötülük yuvasının anısı bile inancıma bir hakarettir. Yurdumun adını dualarla ve ibadetlerle hafızamdan sildim, aksi takdirde ruhuma pişmanlık ve kâfirlik tohumları ekebilirdim."
